alert.note: Alert for North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:05AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Itasca and northern Cass Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 205 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laporte, or 14 miles northwest of Walker, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Locations impacted include... Federal Dam, Bena and Lake Winnibigoshish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: North Cass; North Itasca; South Itasca
